title: Question 24
prompt: Dina was searching for a cinnamon flavored coffee for her grandma. She visited four grocery stores in her town.  She inquired with the store managers of each store about the cinnamon coffee.  _________________.  Dina was referred by one of the managers to a coffee supplier in the city which carried the cinnamon coffee.
description: Read the paragraph. Then choose the sentence that best fills the blank in the paragraph.
feedback:
The best supporting detail for this paragraph is, “She was disappointed to see all flavors except cinnamon at the stores.” This sentence makes sense in the sequence of events. After she inquired with the stores, she was disappointed. Then one manager referred her to a supplier.

The choices “She also shopped for ice-cream and butter” and “She located vanilla and hazelnut coffee at each store” aren’t relevant to the story. The choice “Her grandma was thrilled when she saw the cinnamon flavored coffee” doesn’t fit the structure of the paragraph. The paragraph is in chronological order. Her grandma wouldn’t be thrilled before Dina found the coffee.
